snippet: The company initially declined to comment on reports that Roger Ailes, the chief executive, had fired Brian Lewis, one of his chief lieutenants.
abstract: Fox News Channel confirms reports that chief executive Roger Ailes fired Brian Lewis, one of his longest-serving and closest lieutenants, for what it called 'issues related to financial irregularities, as well as for multiple, material and significant breaches of his employment contract;' company initially declined to comment on reports about Lewis.
lead_paragraph: The company initially declined to comment on reports that Roger Ailes, the chief executive, had fired Brian Lewis, one of his chief lieutenants.

headline.main: Fox News Confirms the Firing of a Top Executive Who Was Once Close to Ailes
headline.print_headline: Fox News Confirms the Firing of a Top Executive Who Was Once Close to Ailes
